alert.note: Alert for Quitman; Tallahatchie (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 7:40AM CDT until April 17 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Tallahatchie County in northwestern Mississippi... Southeastern Quitman County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 815 AM CDT. * At 740 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Vance, or 13 miles northwest of Charleston, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Charleston, Enid, Vance, Oakland, Waverly, Denton, Stover and Longstreet. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
